thread.section_title: Moderne St-Germain Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice room, no ventilation
thread.title_full: Nice room, no ventilation - Review of Moderne St-Germain Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: TravelLove717
title: Nice room, no ventilation
text: The room was nice. The colored lights were hilarious... very Vegas. Plenty of room. The only problem was that the bathroom didn't have any ventilation, so after a shower, the steam would fill the bathroom and escape into the rest of the room. Overall, cute place in a great location within walking distance of many things (great bars, Notre Dame, etc). I would recommend this hotel.
